1.text: Fold a plain, white bed sheet in half lengthwise.

2.text: Hold the sheet behind you, with 1 corner above your left shoulder.

3.text: Wrap the sheet around you, stopping in front of your right shoulder.

4.text: Pull the sheet taut, then tie the right corner to the left in a double-knot.

5.text: Tuck the tails of the knot under the shoulder for a nicer look.

6.text: Wrap gold cording around your waist 2 to 3 times to make a belt.

7.text: Adjust the front panel so that it covers your chest.

8.text: Fold a solid-colored bed sheet in half widthwise.

9.text: Hold the left corner of the bed sheet in front of your left shoulder.

10.text: Wrap the sheet around you, finishing in front of your right shoulder.

11.text: Twist the right corner into a rope.

12.text: Bring the rope behind your neck and tie it to the left corner.

13.text: Tuck the knot under the wrapped fabric.

14.text: Tie a belt or cord around your waist to cinch and secure the toga.

15.text: Put on a white tube top and a pair of matching white shorts.

16.text: Fold a white, solid-colored bed sheet in half widthwise.

17.text: Wrap the folded edge around your torso, just under the armpits.

18.text: Tuck the left corner under the wrapped fabric.

19.text: Tie a belt or cord around your waist to cinch and secure the toga.
